name: Cheese N' Balls
description:
Welcome to Cheese N' Balls!!

In this android game you will help our sheriff hamster to defend the town cheese from the enemies!! 

There are three types of enemies you will have to fight against: Rats, Flies and Moles. Each one of them behaves in a different way so be careful and good luck!!

Art: Rafa, @Jaybuhh and GuillermoZexiam

Programming: @IvanSploy @Jvicog and @C.Mariano
